Town Council

The Derry Town Council meets regularly every first and third Tuesday at 7:00 p.m. in the Derry Municipal Center located at 14 Manning Street, Derry, NH 03038. Â Meetings are broadcast live on Comcast Channel 17 (Derry residents only).
Â 
Derry has the unique position of having a seven member Town Council that is responsible as both the legislative and governing body of town government. The Council has full policy, budgetary, and organizational responsibilities, including the appointment of the Town Administrator, who is charged with the day to day operations.
Â 
Each Councilor is elected to a three year term, and the terms are staggered. Â 
Â 
*Click on individual Councilor's name to send an email or clickÂ hereÂ to send the entire Council an email.
Â
